---
title: Metatarsophalangeal Joints (MTP)
---


# Osteokinematics

- Extension: 50-60&deg; actively
- Flexion:
    - 30-40&deg; AROM
    - 90&deg; passively (i.e. during *terminal stance*)
- Abduction: Minimal
- Adduction: Minimal


# Ligaments

All 5 metatarsophalangeal joints are linked proximally by the *transverse metatarsal ligament* at each metatarsal head @jonesProjectFoundations2025.
